oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NUMERICAL SOLVABILITY OF HAMMERSTEIN INTEGRAL-EQUATIONS OF MIXED TYPE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GANESH, M
JOSHI, MC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: collocation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a mixed Hammerstein integral equation of the form [GRAPHICS] where -infinity < a < b < infinity, y, f(i), and k(i) (1 less-than-or-equal-to i less-than-or-equal-to m) are known functions and x is a solution to be determined. In this paper, we obtain existence, uniqueness, and numerical solvability of (I) under certain smoothness assumptions on the known functions y, f(i), and k(i).
